Our Story
Founded 2024
Started by educators, technologists, and community organizers who believed everyone deserves to understand the technology shaping their future.
Free workshops every month
Plain-language resources
Welcoming community
Our Mission

Bridging the AI knowledge gap in Newark

Artificial Intelligence is transforming how we work, learn, and live. But too often, AI education is locked behind jargon, expensive courses, or intimidating tech environments.

Newark AI Town Hall exists to change that. We bring free, plain-language AI education directly to our community‚Äîthrough workshops, resources, and events designed for real people with real questions.

2025
Founded in Newark, NJ

Started by a group of educators, technologists, and community organizers who believed everyone deserves to understand the technology shaping their future.

Our values

These principles guide everything we do at Newark AI Town Hall.

Accessibility first

Plain language, no jargon, and content designed for all skill levels. If your grandmother can't understand it, we rewrite it.

Community-centered

Built by Newark, for Newark. Our programs address the real questions and concerns of our neighbors, not abstract tech trends.

Ethical AI

We teach not just how AI works, but how to use it responsibly. Privacy, bias, and fairness are part of every conversation.

Empowerment

Our goal isn't to make you dependent on experts‚Äîit's to give you the confidence to explore, question, and use AI on your own terms.

Who we serve

Our programs are designed for everyone in the Newark community.
